channel.title: OpenGL ES on Losinggeneration's Coding and Projects
channel.description: Recent content in OpenGL ES on Losinggeneration's Coding and Projects

item.title: Didj OpenGL ES
item.description: Well, I may be the first to get even basic OpenGL ES primitives to render. I can now make my claim that NeHe lesson02 works for the Didj. Some others have things such as OpenGL version strings, but I believe this is the first actual rendering for Didj homebrew. I’ve gone a slightly different route then what others have done. I’ve used Brio directly to satisfy some of the OpenGL ES dependencies.
